nodes.text: Vogel 7 was a low-gravity planet in the Vogel system of the Mid Rim.

It was the homeworld of Lieutenant Cecius and Ranulf Trommer. The planet was home to a branch of the Imperial Academy where Atton Repness trained. The Imperial base on the planet was captured by the Rebel Alliance. Ranulf Trommer grew up in the Naval Academy on Vogel 7.
